  @/@24638
  sname
  allowBlur
  stype
  boolean
  sinputtype
  truefalse
  sgroup
  Editor
  sdefault
  true
  Sdescription
#$@text#$@
True to <a href="output/Ext.Editor.html#Ext.Editor-completeEdit" ext:member="completeEdit" ext:cls="Ext.Editor">complete the editing process</a> if in edit mode when the
field is blurred. Defaults to <tt>true</tt>.
#$@text#$@
